prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered nurturing pose with arms open in welcoming embrace, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted crystalline solid head with unique dodecahedron structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying comforting divine. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating dodecahedron, fractal matrix, spiral patterns, styled with Dominion guides influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by Emerald and neutral grey inspired by shifting structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns fused with systems dynamics vests and Fractal pattern robes with flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding, incorporating chaotic fiber blends, elaborate with shifting Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns and dodecahedron emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals combined with complexity compass with comforting spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor RONOOMB's profile: 'He who protects the process of becoming', Aethyr TOR, Earth element, Tarot The Empress, Sephirot Netzach, Zodiac Taurus, embodying the essence: 'As RONOOMB approaches, a comforting warmth enfolds the space generosity and support flow freely, urging everyone to give and care for one another.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered nurturing pose with arms open in welcoming embrace
visual_elements.head_shape: large multi-faceted crystalline solid head with unique dodecahedron structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with multi-faceted facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying comforting divine
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating dodecahedron, fractal matrix, spiral patterns, styled with Dominion guides influences

outfit.base: structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns fused with systems dynamics vests and Fractal pattern robes
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding, incorporating chaotic fiber blends
outfit.details: Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns
outfit.magical_essence: crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles

visual_elements.accessory: rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals combined with complexity compass
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who protects the process of becoming'
profile_data.essence: As RONOOMB approaches, a comforting warmth enfolds the space generosity and support flow freely, urging everyone to give and care for one another.
profile_data.angelic_role: Dominion of Hearth of Generosity; guides iron-winged legionaries.
profile_data.form_description: A multi-faceted earthen crystalline structure that shifts between solid geometry and organic flow, representing the transformative nature of becoming. Inspired by the Merkaba and Flower of Life sacred geometries, embodying both stability and potential for change.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Emerald green represents Earth element and Taurus, while bronze symbolizes generosity and the iron-winged legionary essence. The shifting quality reflects the dynamic process of becoming.
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Dodecahedron represents divine intelligence, fractal matrix shows infinite potential, spiral symbolizes growth and transformation from Hermetic and Taoist traditions
